Key Match Events: Xie Wenneng scored the opening goal for China after 19 minutes.
Lewis Miller scored his first international goal just before the break.
Craig Goodwin scored a spectacular goal from outside the area eight minutes after the restart.
Nishan Velupillay scored in stoppage time on his debut international appearance.
Post-Match Reflections: Tony Popovic's first game in charge resulted in a 3-1 victory for Australia.
Popovic was hired last month after the resignation of Graham Arnold as head coach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Adelaide Oval with a crowd of 46,000.
Australia is aiming for a sixth straight World Cup appearance.
Australia is second in Group C above Saudi Arabia.
